name: Hong Kong Digital Asset Exchange
introduce: Hong Kong Digital Asset Exchange（HKD.com） is a digital asset trading platform. HKD.com is committed to the materialisation and popularisation of digital currency. In addition to the secure online digital currency trading platform, it has also set up a digital currency trading entity store with a floor space of nearly 10,000 square feet in a core commercial area of Hong Kong, and is presently one of the largest digital asset exchanges in Hong Kong.
